body:
@carpathianflorist this is a ridiculous powertrip. I've heard that you absolutely despise me and seeing as you do this reddit mod shit I now understand exactly why. I bet cap was even in on this, he permabanned @JosephGoebbels for something that's supposed to be only a 7-day ban, and then you immediately sieged his guild, a gimmick I have totally never heard of before.

I bet I'm exiled for this. Go ahead, DefaultMods 2.0. I don't want any part of it.
body_html:
@carpathianflorist this is a ridiculous powertrip. I've heard that you absolutely despise me and seeing as you do this reddit mod shit I now understand exactly why. I bet cap was even in on this, he permabanned @JosephGoebbels for something that's supposed to be only a 7-day ban, and then you immediately sieged his guild, a gimmick I have totally never heard of before.

I bet I'm exiled for this. Go ahead, DefaultMods 2.0. I don't want any part of it.

That said, anybody want to take over +Poolside or +Current_Auctions and keep it active?

body:
Respectfully, all speech should be allowed everywhere. Yes, it‚Äôs uncivil; But it‚Äôs freedom. It may just be one guild now, but eventually we‚Äôll become Reddit if we censor others.

I don‚Äôt personally understand the Jew hate, but I support the right to feel how you want to feel.
